name: Alpha
description: The Beginning: Ex Nihilo, Immersive Engineering, Ex Astris Rebirth, Magneticraft, Tinkers' Construct.

quests.name: #Poundtheground
quests.description: Pound the ground to gain pebbles (this only works in the botania Garden of Glass) and craft cobblestone.

tasks.longDescription: Can hammer down compressed cobble into compressed gravel and so on. Remember Ex Compressum is not in this pack. Kappa mode: Can sieve compressed variants of gravel, sand, dust, and dirt.

quests.name: Random Act of Kindness
quests.description: A gift from the Titan Council to you.

tasks.longDescription: Remember Veinminer is in this pack, just incase you don't realize it.

quests.name: Begin Again
quests.description: Begin by collecting wood, Crooks can be used for silk worms and collecting a bit more saplings than normal.

tasks.longDescription: Insert compostable material in this to obtain dirt or adding water and dust for clay.

quests.name: The Sieve
quests.description: Craft a sieve to begin the siege of sieving montages. Can hammer down compressed cobblestone all the way down to compressed dust.

quests.name: Sieving Montage I
quests.description: Sieving dirt can give you different types of seeds you may find useful.

quests.name: Sieving Montage II
quests.description: Grow these then make juice out of them will keep you from going hungry, well until you want something more filling.

quests.name: Cobble Gen
quests.description: Generate cobblestone by placing the transfer node on the cobblestone between the water and lava then insert World interaction upgrade.

quests.name: Lava Generation!
quests.description: Generate Lava through melting cobblestone in a crucible (need to melt 4-5 cobblestone for a full bucket) and you can melt ender lilly seeds for resonant ender.

tasks.longDescription: The Crucible can use yellorium/uranium blocks and nuclear bombs to melt objects down quickly.

quests.name: Sieving Montage III
quests.description: Sieve gravel for items unobtainable by other sievable materials.

quests.name: Sieving Montage IV
quests.description: Sieve sand for items unobtainable by other sievable materials.

tasks.longDescription: In Titan/Kappa Mode sieve sand for Electrotine.

quests.name: Sieving Montage V
quests.description: Sieve dust for items unobtainable by other sievable materials.

quests.name: Burning Power!
quests.description: Very inefficient power source in terms of speed but its a start. Maybe upgrade to a stirling generator later.

quests.name: Automatic Sieving!
quests.description: Title says it all.

quests.name: Iron Chest
quests.description: Upgrade-able chests

quests.name: Coke Oven
quests.description: May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

quests.name: Gotta Go Deeper!
quests.description: The Nether filled with dangers known to take you down.

quests.name: Treated Wood!
quests.description: May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

quests.name: Water Power!
quests.description: May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

quests.name: Learning to Tinker!
quests.description: Make your first tool out of tool parts. Recommend starting with using wood and flint or just plastic.

tasks.longDescription: A task where the player has to craft specific items using oak wood.

quests.name: Tinkering With Metals!
quests.description: The Smeltery is a multi-block construct requiring you to have at least 84 Seared Bricks, or 19 Seared Brick blocks, a Smeltery Controller, and either a seared Tank, Seared Window, or Seared Glass. The Smeltery can be any rectangular shape up to 7 blocks per side. Becareful of mixing metals unless you mean to do so.

quests.name: Mob Farm!
quests.description: Setup a mob farm to begin the onslaught for sweet loots. Recommend being atleast 24 blocks away from your base although bloodmoons will help.

quests.name: Behead The Head!
quests.description: Collect 3 Wither Skulls from Withers skeletons from the Nether or by pouring Witch Water on normal skeletons.

quests.name: Gears!
quests.description: Used to make gears.

quests.name: Wither Boss!
quests.description: Simple, kill the Wither Boss however be aware of the Hardcore Wither mod.

quests.name: Hemp!
quests.description: May harvest hemp seeds by breaking grass. Can grow grass through bone mealing grass blocks. May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

tasks.longDescription: Hemp is a good source for string.
A task where the player has to craft an Engineer's Hammer.

quests.name: Power Cables!
quests.description: May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

quests.name: Connectors and Relays!
quests.description: May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

quests.name: Thermo Power
quests.description: May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

quests.name: LMH Capacitors
quests.description: May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

quests.name: Mob Hunter
quests.description: Kill Blazes, Magma Cubes and Flame Spiders.

quests.name: Carbide
quests.description: Surrond one tungsten with 8 coal.

quests.name: LMH Wires
quests.description: Same idea as Immersive Engineering for power manipulation.

quests.name: Wind Turbines
quests.description: Bigger is better (in this case).

quests.name: Electricity->Redstoneflux
quests.description: This will be made more than once due to the 400 rf/t limit it has.

quests.name: Sieving Montage VI
quests.description: Hammer down Netherrack for crushed Netherrack in order to obtain gold 100% of the time. Quartz from Soul Sand.

quests.name: Similar
quests.description: This is very similar to IE's version.

quests.name: Stirling Multiblock
quests.description: Shift on items to see what they do.

quests.name: Turbine Multiblock
quests.description: Shift on items to see what they do.

quests.name: Thermo Power
quests.description: Place cool substance and hot substance next to this to gain power.

quests.name: Squeezer
quests.description: May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

quests.name: Fermenter
quests.description: May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

quests.name: Refinery
quests.description: May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

tasks.longDescription: Oil + nutrient distillation = fuel. plantoil + biodiesel = tectonic distillation.

quests.name: Heat Transfer
quests.description: Shift on items to see what they do.

quests.name: Infinite Water/Steam
quests.description: Shift on items to see what they do.

quests.name: Diesel Generator
quests.description: May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

quests.name: You Never Know!
quests.description: May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

quests.name: Enchanting Table
quests.description: Vanilla Enchanting Table

quests.name: Blubber Tub
quests.description: Can automatically add modifiers to Tinkers' weapons without needing to do so manually.

quests.name: Efficiency
quests.description: Apply redstone to these and dig faster with your own hands.

quests.name: Steel Production
quests.description: May find any information you need in the Engineer's Manual.

quests.name: Gem Cast
quests.description: Used to make emeralds or ender pearls.

quests.name: Nugget Cast
quests.description: Used to make nugget versions of different metals.

quests.name: Plate Cast
quests.description: Used to make Heavy Plates of metals and non-metals.

quests.name: Pickaxe Cast
quests.description: Used to make pickaxe heads.

quests.name: Rod Cast
quests.description: Used to make tool rods.

quests.name: Tough Rod Cast
quests.description: Used to make tough tool rods for more advanced tools.

quests.name: Cleaver Cast
quests.description: Used to make cleaver heads. Recommended for beheadding mobs.

quests.name: Crossbow Limb Cast
quests.description: Used to make crossbow limbs.

quests.name: Crossbow Body Cast
quests.description: Used to make crossbow bodies.

quests.name: Knapsack
quests.description: Extra inventory space and extra inventory tab.

quests.name: Tool Bind Cast
quests.description: Used to make tool bindings.

quests.name: Tough Tool Bind Cast
quests.description: Used to make tough tool bindings for more advanced tools.

quests.name: Requiescat In Pace
quests.description: Take a trip to the Aether to gain an Extra Life. Repeatable every 8 days.

tasks.longDescription: A villager requested these items, but we don't know what for...

quests.name: Tectonic Petrotheum
quests.description: Can be used to make oil.

quests.name: Magnetically Refined
quests.description: Can be used to refine tectonic petrotheum into oil and sewage into nutrient distillation.

quests.name: Iron Furnace
quests.description: Cooks Items 1.5 times as fast as the usual furnace.

quests.name: Gold Furnace
quests.description: Cooks Items twice as fast as the usual furnace.

quests.name: Diamond Furnace
quests.description: Cooks Items 4x as fast as the usual furnace.

quests.name: Hell Furnace
quests.description: Cooks Items 25x as fast as the usual furnace.

quests.name: Extreme Furnace
quests.description: Cooks Items 50x as fast as the usual furnace.

quests.name: Furnace Upgraded
quests.description: Storage upgrade: Sneak-click with it on a Better Furnace to enlarge it's internal Storage.                                                                       The BFESU must be touching the furnace in order to use rf instead of burnables.

tasks.longDescription: Package Upgrade: This is an upgrade into which you can put 3 upgrades (Even other Packages).
